website_summaries.verdict: The classic approach to sausage stuffing for anyone who wants the authentic experience and product.
pros: Table-mounted design fits on any hard surface around the kitchen
Hand crank turns smoothly with one hand, freeing up the other to guide the sausage for the best results
cons: Hand crank operation is more time consuming than electric sausage stuffers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small batches of sausage.
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with my new sausage stuffer! I was having a lot of irritation stuffing sausage with my grinder, because the ground meat was not feeding through the grinder perfectly. When I used the plunger to push the previously ground meat down, my casings were ballooning from air. My new sausage stuffer is easy-to-use and easy to fill. I made 15 pounds or so, and even though I had to fill it a few times, we ended up with a bunch of beautiful sausages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, handle could be larger & grippier
customer_reviews.text: This style of meat flattener is the best I've found for making nice, even chicken, pork or venison cutlets. I can focus on keeping the poumder level and let the tool's weight do the rest. You'll never get that precision with the style shaped like a hammer. Wish the handle were a bit longer and thicker to accommodate my large hands, and a little less slippery. That said, from an sanitation perspective, all stainless steel beats a competitor's plastic handle verison. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: knute

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have used this style of meat pounder for years. My first one had a plastic handle that cracked from the heat of the dishwasher. I became concerned that bacteria might be lodging inside the cracks and that the whole thing would eventually just fall apart. I shopped for quite a while to find the same style pounder that was made just from stainless steel. Here it is. The other pounder is going in the trash. This one looks like it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: C. Friske

customer_reviews.title: The base doesn't suck and it should.
customer_reviews.text: I've just tossed mine in the trash after a couple of months of use. The suction base doesn't suck. Normally when something doesn't suck it's a good thing but a suction base should suck and this one doesn't so the whole unit slides around on the counter when in use. Filling the hopper is a messy job. This unit does not hold much so it needs to be refilled often. It might be good for test runs but it doesn't fill the bill when I need to make more money than a couple of pounds of sausage.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Great weight. Nice flat surface. Could use a knob or grip on the handle. Slippery if your hand gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: G.R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for starting out, but I ended up buying an electric one. If you're making a lot of sausage (more than 3-5lbs), then don't waste your time because it's super annoying to stop stuffing and refill every 1 lb or so. The suction base is just ok, and stuffing can be a little awkward. But if you want something cheap and plan on making small batches then this is good.
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect starter size
customer_reviews.text: This is s perfect tool to start learning and experimenting with making sausages. It is a manageable size, and will accommodate a 1- to 2-lb run of sausage meat. And its modest price is well-suited to begin the learning process. It feels extremely well-made and should last a long time. We're looking forward to trying more interesting sausage recipes.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sausage stuffer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent sausage stuffer for the money. The only complaint I have is that after a minute or two the suction cup loses its suction, but that's easy to deal with. And it's strong while the suction lasts. Also, I would suggest taking the suction part off when cleaning so that you can clean and dry it properly. There is a little clip that can be pushed off with a couple of flathead screwdrivers or a with tool specifically for that. But it's probably not necessary to do that, I just don't want slime or mold or bacteria growing inside that part of my tool.
customer_reviews.author: Zuxu 8421

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. The base suctioned perfectly to our stainless kitchen cart. The seal inside kept tight and nothing leaked. I do suggest two people (one to turn, one to help guide the filled sausage), although I'm sure you could do it with one. Easy to clean. Can't wait to try to make more sausage!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: My disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very much disappointed. I always try to find amazon choice things. But when I fit the base funnel, it broke.
customer_reviews.author: jamesb

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love it bought as a present and kept for myself. Good call don’t have much strength but don’t need it with this. Well weighted nice kitchen tool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product I loved it and enjoy making sausage with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product I loved it and enjoy making sausage with it. I use the sheep casing so it is perfect for what I do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like it.
customer_reviews.text: We like it..works more easily than the hammer style tenderizer.
customer_reviews.author: AniTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality unit
customer_reviews.text: My use for this sausage maker has nothing to do with making sausages, so you can disregard this review if need be. It’s a well made machine with suits my purposes well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M

customer_reviews.title: Works great...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great meat pounder. You don’t have to add really any pressure, you pretty much just have to drop your hand with the weight of the pounder.
customer_reviews.author: K Vrabel

customer_reviews.title: wrench size
customer_reviews.text: the nut that holds the crank is 1/2". however the wrech supplied is 9/16". the wrench is made from very cheap metal. unless you supply a strong wrench i would't recommend this product. i had to purchase a better quality wrench .
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Wojtecki

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Fast, easy to fill, assemble, and clean. Out-performs my old huge lever one that cost 3x as much which I hated. This is a delight!
customer_reviews.author: FrostEternal

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to install and use, but edge is too sharp
customer_reviews.text: In general, it is a good tool for making sausage. It is easy to assembly, install and use, but a little big hard to clean. The edge to cylinder is too sharp, so I finger was cut deeply during cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: ... steaks with this and it is working out just fine. A quick fry and easy to do with ...
customer_reviews.text: been pounding chicken thighs and thin steaks with this and it is working out just fine. A quick fry and easy to do with as you wish. Burritos, tacos, salads. You're the boss.
customer_reviews.author: Joexg30

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done if not in a quick or elegant way. Decent value.
customer_reviews.author: R.F. Knotts

customer_reviews.title: Absolute most buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother who makes sausages, very easy to use and produces lots of sausages with little effort and in a short period of time, easy to clean and the suction is strong, sticks to the countertop no matter how hard you move it, great purchase
customer_reviews.author: dramo219

customer_reviews.title: We do recommend
customer_reviews.text: For the price point it worked well on our first round of sausage. No real problems. Would recommend for smaller batches and easy to clean etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great girthy sausages
customer_reviews.text: Great girthy sausages. Easy to stuff. I use this to make sausages from scrap meat in our kitchen to save food cost.
customer_reviews.author: HungryHowrey

customer_reviews.title: Things are okay!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a long time and used it once. I was not very skillful in the first operation. But it worked. Things are okay.
customer_reviews.author: yanfang yang

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stuffing Venison Sausage!!
customer_reviews.text: Used for stuffing venison sausage, middle sized attachment was perfect. Very easy to use!!

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: This sausage stuffer is great! Easy to use and clean and makes a quick and easy job of sausage stuffing! I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made!
customer_reviews.text: The handle came off after running it through the dishwasher!

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Italian sausage stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome inexpensive sausage stuffer. We made sausage our first try - no issues
customer_reviews.author: Michael tucci

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Clean up is a cinch and attachments were exactly what i needed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this is a portable stuffer, good quality, fast delivery

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, ok for house use.
customer_reviews.text: Just used it once, made about 3 kg, it's use was very easy and simple, attached firmly and cleaning was also very easy.

customer_reviews.title: It's nice
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product just it's hard to clean it after using it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, ordered a second one as a gift. And they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Used to use my Kitchen-Aide with attachments to stuff casings, but this works so much better and clean up is a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D Smith

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY CONTAMINATES FOOD WITH ANTI SIEZE
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to use. Couldn't turn as suction wouldn't hold. The gear box has anti sieze that came out and contaminated my food. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and she loved it. Worked great. Has a good weight to it. I have been looking for this for her a long time.
customer_reviews.author: sharon hopper

customer_reviews.title: Pounder
customer_reviews.text: We have used this pounder.It's really heavy but it works well. We have also used it to smooth crumb crusts and it does a good job. I beat a couple of pork chops with it and they were quite tender. It does what it's supposed to do. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylo

customer_reviews.title: These are great value. easy to tender the
customer_reviews.text: I now have 2 pairs. These are great value. easy to tender the meat
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: lies well in the hand, heavy enough to make a schnitzel slim! :) no sharp edges or corners. liegt gut in der Hand, schwer genug um ein Schnitzel zu plätten! :) Keine scharfen Kanten und Ecken
customer_reviews.author: WMR

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. It flattens poultry as well as pork and doesn't take up a lot of space in the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Ohyler M. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth one. 1st one was a wedding gift from my Omi. It burned in a fire. 2nd one ended up with my daughter. 3rd one was stolen. I would not keep buying them for 43 years if they weren’t worth it. Best tool for pounding Schnitzel. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: phanuelsdaughter

customer_reviews.title: One of the best on the market considering price, quality and beautiful stainless steel construction
customer_reviews.text: If you need a high quality well constructed meat pounder this is the one buy. Great for pounding veal. Also great for pounding chicken breast to event he great. The breast cooks faster and is cooked evenly throughout.
customer_reviews.author: bernard

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife... Happy life.
customer_reviews.text: Nice wide surface area. be careful not to bust your wrist if too close to the edge of the counter.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Works great, is solidly built
customer_reviews.text: Works great, is solidly built, and it's dishwasher safe. I had an OXO Good Grips one before this and made the mistake of putting it in the dishwasher. The finish on the OXO one started disintegrating after that. I'm very happy now that I can run this new pounder through the dishwasher after using it on raw chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Debby R

customer_reviews.title: Great little pounder
customer_reviews.text: Really effective and very compact. Easy to clean in dishwasher. Gave nice even results. So much better than hammer type pounders.
customer_reviews.author: Slstory

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Not to heavy, and it works great on any type of meat.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Rock

customer_reviews.title: Best ever tool for flattening meats.
customer_reviews.text: Makes pounding meat easier than anything else I've used! The large, heavy surface makes it easy to use and easy to control! Given many of these as gifts to my foodie friends. Easy to clean and always looks appealing as a kitchen gadget with its stainless steel shine.
customer_reviews.author: busyliving

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: pound pound POUND POUND POUND pound pound. Ya caun't 'ave yer puddn' if ya dun't bet yer meat.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L Kelly

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but the handle is a little slippery after use. Clean up is easy, able to sanitize with no problems after use.
customer_reviews.author: bfsb

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love making chicken piccata and this pounder worked great I would definitely recommend it to anyone it was a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Caddesigner

customer_reviews.title: Not a solid surface
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that this item does not have a solid stainless steel design like the meat pounder I have in my other home. This is my fault since I did not read or examine carefully before selecting. The seam just above the pounding surface is prone to dents and is hard to clean and dry. I expect rust to be a potential problem in the future. Other than these issue I have no complaints. The item is heavy and solid and works well to do the job of pounding meat to a uniform thickness.
customer_reviews.author: ljf

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Save some money and spend more on something worth your while.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a literally trash. It is made out of super thin metal that rubs off as soon as you thread it together. There is no way to use this without contaminating your food. Not to mention if you are using hog casing you get 2-3 6” links then you are reloading the hopper. So if you have 3 hours to pack 10 lbs of sausage and don’t mind eating metal bis and debris this is the packer for you.
customer_reviews.author: C89

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget but already starting to rust
customer_reviews.text: I love this simple sausage stuffer. It is perfect for beginners, easy to use, and is priced appropriately. It is also very easy to clean (hand wash only). Unfortunately, I am giving it only 3/5 stars because it is already starting to rust on the inside. I have used it only about 5 times since May. I take good care of my kitchen tools and I don’t leave things sitting around in water, so I don’t think this is a user-error problem. Would give 5/5 if it was better quality.
customer_reviews.author: B.N.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sausage stuffer for the Home sausage maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sausage stuffer for the Home sausage maker. I make my sausage in about 2 to 3 lb batches and I have to refill it a few times. But it works just fine and it's so much better than using that KitchenAid attachment. I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: deena

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Item received without any rough edges or flaws; very easy to hand wash. Great for relieving tension by pounding the daylights out of chicken breasts!
customer_reviews.author: HerdingCats

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Great for First Time sausage maker
customer_reviews.text: This worked great. Much better than expected! I am a first time sausage maker and this was awesome! Definitely worth the money for an amateur small amount sausage maker. Attached are sausages I made with it yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: BI6P0PPAPUMP

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate anchoring with the suction cup.
customer_reviews.text: It is simple, seems well built, but not physically stable during use. The suction cup keeps it from lifting up, but not from rotating from the torque of turning the crank. It caused me to hit my knuckles on my counter top edge multiple times. If you had a third hand to hold it still, while cranking, and contolling the emerging sausage, it would work out fine, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say I am a chef but I don’t make sausage regularly so this worked perfect for my needs. Only drawback is the amount of sausage that can be loaded in is a small amount so you have to continuously reload it. To fix that you would need to buy one of the $100+ dollar stuffers but I don’t make it that often so this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for chicken francaise and weiner schnitzel
customer_reviews.text: Generous 3.25" round surface area and heavy weight makes quick work of pounding chicken breasts, veal cutlets, and boneless pork chops flat for pan frying or searing. A huge time saver over the hammer style meat pounders.
customer_reviews.author: Turbo6

customer_reviews.title: Great suction cups, stuffs easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he makes his own sausage. He loves it! It was so much better than a popular brand name version and the suction on the counter top is really good. The process of stuffing the casing is really easy and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy all one piece design and easy-to-use. I recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: PJK

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I have been making my own sausages for the last several years but using the attachment on my grinder. This is so much easier. I stuffed over 10 pounds in less than 20 minutes. Refilling the cylinder and clean up were also easy.
customer_reviews.author: jenjay1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and easy to clean. Had no issues with the suction pad not sticking as other users have mentioned.

customer_reviews.title: Give your meat a pounding Chicken cutlets
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for chicken cutlets as far as beef not as well or pork but ok

customer_reviews.title: Great find.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to tenderize and smash my garlic Italian style. Ordered several for the entire family. Goes into dishwasher like a dream and out like new. Very durable and sturdy weight.

customer_reviews.title: Sausage maker
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to use. Suction is not that great, so 4 stars.

customer_reviews.title: thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a great price, delivered on time, thank you.

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: It takes several usages to get it to work as expected. Great for small runs.

customer_reviews.title: If your starting to make sausage this is a good stuffer to start with
customer_reviews.text: If your starting to make sausage this is a good stuffer to start with. This stuffer holds enough meat to stuff about 3/4 of a casing. Cranks really easy and tubes attach easy also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a smooth surface.
customer_reviews.text: I suction is ok so long c as it is on a perfectly smooth surface. The surface I was using wasn't and it kept coming loose. I changed surface band it was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This has met all my expectations. Heavy enough to pound pork into cutlets and light enough to do the same with veal.

customer_reviews.title: Works great;
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a hotteok press. Works great ;D

customer_reviews.title: Old school is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: Ok let start by saying am so happy I found this product. Trust I used this in Italy when chef starting out this is great for veal and chicken cutlets. Make the cutlets perfect. This a very old school product heavyweight and very well made. I must tell you super restaurant quality type of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Tony Macaroni

customer_reviews.title: EASE OF USE
customer_reviews.text: I find this easier to use than the meat pounders with the long arm. Easier for carpel tunnel trouble, and will pound out a piece of meat in no time! The steak will plump back up some, so don't worry you've beaten it to death.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL J MCKELVEY

customer_reviews.title: Used this once and it worked great
customer_reviews.text: I don't pount meat often but this made short work of some pork a few weeks back. Works great and since it's nearly one solid piece it's easy to clean. Heavy as heck.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kumor

customer_reviews.title: Black lead stuff releases from the coil. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Black lead stuff releases from the coil. I had to clean it each time I reloaded so it didn't get into the sausage.
customer_reviews.author: Dany K

customer_reviews.title: Great for pounding my meat!  :)
customer_reviews.text: Seriously though, maximum bang for the buck when pounding out chicken breasts, veal or venison for schnitzel, or just round steak for rouladen. Easy to keep clean, and store. After reviewing all that were available, this seems to be the best buy. WARNING; be aware of where your other hand and fingers are when using.
customer_reviews.author: 1busydad

customer_reviews.title: Really Heavy and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy, great construction. Looked at a bunch before I deleted this one. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JeffSheff

customer_reviews.title: great meat pounder
customer_reviews.text: this is a great meat pounder, it makes every thing the same thickness and thats great for chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth R.

customer_reviews.title: Needful kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Makes meats tender and easy to chew. Helps to make beautiful dishes by making meat flatter for roll up meat recipes. Great for crushing cookies for crumb crust. Excellent to hold your pastry sheet in place. Don't know how I ever cooked without it.
customer_reviews.author: peggy haggard

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient at pounding chicken. Heavy duty. Should last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: perfect size  well made  good price
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what you want it to...pounds stuff flat. I use it for chicken cutlets and for crushing peppercorns. I have not had a rusting problem per other raters....I just make sure to put it stem side down in my drying rack after I have washed it. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: LTC

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Balanced, Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight and the diameter is just right for a multitude of for food preparations. Awed by the quality at such a reasonable price. Thank you HIC!
customer_reviews.author: Sssss

customer_reviews.title: Double Duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this meat pounder to use as a weight when cooking sausage patties. Sausage patties tend to "cup" when you turn them over, requiring you to press them flat with a spatula to finish cooking. This tool is perfect for the job. The right diameter and weight keeps the patty flat but not too much. The stainless steel finish cleans up well. I'm certain it will also perform well if using it to pound a chicken breast flat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Warmington

customer_reviews.title: New tool for favorite meal!
customer_reviews.text: I just started to get into making pan sauces and my new favorite dish is chicken piccata. With this new meat pounder, I can get the breasts to a perfect even thickness to cook evenly and come out moist and tender. Perfect piccata every time! I was concerned about the lip and rust building up from trapped water, but I've had it for a few months now without issue--I wash by hand and when drying I lay it on its side to drain the small thin opening.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Pound away
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every night to pound chicken breasts. I also use it to crush cookies for pie crusts,M&ms ,you name it! It is sooooo. Heavy and sturdy, couldn't live without it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toro

customer_reviews.title: Great Pounding Tool
customer_reviews.text: Have not used this yet, but it's a very sturdy and heavy-duty pounder and my next chicken fillets will get a good beating. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sartin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, hard to pound larger pieces of meat. A handle mallet is easier to use
customer_reviews.author: Marshy

customer_reviews.title: Not  Really Dishwasher Safe Darling
customer_reviews.text: I chose this Papa Verino's meat hammer just because someone's review said it was dishwasher safe. Who wouldn't choose a sterilizing dishwasher over hand wash? When it arrived, the attached label says "hand wash in warm, soapy water". So choose ANY meat tenderizer, None are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Chew

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking, heavy meat pounder. It does the job. I gave it 3 stars because mine is crooked (The handle leans). I did not complain to amazon because it wasn't worth my time. It was not very expensive. I still like it even though it's crooked :)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Leib

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use it to stuff manicotti shells, excellent for that use, easy to disassemble and clean. You can easily misalign the threads putting it back together so make sure you get that right.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H

product_meta.title: Fantes Sausage Maker with Suction Base and 3 Nozzles, 2.2-Pound Capacity, The Italian Market Original since 1906
product_meta.description: Style Name:Sausage MakerFante's Uncle attilio’s Sausage maker easily creates fresh, homemade Sausage recipes from around the world at home. Quickly customize delicious flavor and meat combinations, and control fat content and quality for tastier homemade Sausage results. The real fun of Sausage making is to experiment for unique variations. Try different add-ins, like apples, cheeses, and vegetables, all chopped small enough to fit through the nozzle opening. Includes 3 nozzle sizes (15, 19, and 22-millimeter diameter) to make thin, regular, and plump Sausage links. The crank-style handle makes operation simple. The suction base secures to any nonporous surface for easy setup and added stability during use. Simply secure suction base to work surface. Fill the sausage maker canister with sausage meat. Slide the entire casing length onto the desired size nozzle and turn the handle to fill. Make sure to guide the filled Sausage by hand to prevent it from breaking. Tie both ends at desired lengths to secure the stuffing inside. Includes Sausage stuffer with suction base, 3 nozzles (15, 19, and 22-millimeter diameter), complete instructions, and a Fante’s family recipe. Disassembles for easy cleaning. Hand wash in warm, soapy water. Fante’s, the Italian market original since 1906. Brought to you by HIC Harold Import Co.
feature_bullets: Fante's Uncle Attilio’s Sausage Maker for easily creating homemade sausage recipes and controlling fat levels and content quality for tastier results
Made from aluminum and plastic; suction base secures to any nonporous surface; measures 16. 5 x 4 x 8-inches; holds up to 2. 2 pounds
Create thin, regular and plump Links with 3 nozzle sizes (15, 19, and 22-millimeter diameter); customize flavor and meat combinations
Fill Canister with sausage meat, slide casing onto the nozzle and turn handle to fill; guide casing by hand to prevent breakage; tie at desired length
Suction base and crank handle for easy use; Includes instructions and Fatness family recipe; disassembles for cleaning; Hand wash in warm, soapy water

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars242 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
